response.original_title: Right to Exist: Santa Cruz Skateboards
response.overview: Santa Cruz Skateboards is proud to present “Right To Exist.” The first full length Santa Cruz Skateboards video since 2005. Filmed over the span of a year and a half and featuring Kevin Braun, Eric Dressen, Blake Johnson, Tom Remillard,Steve Alba, Mikey Curtis, Tom Knox, Dylan Williams, Tom Asta, Erick Winkowski, Emmanuel Guzman and Jason Jessee. Santa Cruz Skateboards was founded in 1973 by Richard Novak, Doug Haut and Jay Shuirman.
response.tagline: Santa Cruz Skateboards is proud to present “Right To Exist.” The first full length Santa Cruz Skateboards video since 2005. Filmed over the span of a year and a half and featuring the entire Santa Cruz team.
response.title: Right to Exist: Santa Cruz Skateboards
